About us

Dr. Pathak's Superspecialty Dental & Implant Clinic

Dr. Pathak's Superspecialty Dental & Implant Clinic was established in the year 2012. It has a team of specialists who provide specialised dental care.

Dr. Tushar Pathak & Dr. Mudita Pathak

The clinic is primarily run by Dr. Tushar Pathak [MDS(Periodontist & Oral Implantologist)] and Dr. Mudita Pathak(BDS) situated at Santoshi mata Road, Rambaug, Kalyan west.

Personalized and High-Quality Dental Care

We offer personalized, high-quality dental care for the whole family, utilizing cutting-edge equipment and advanced pain management.

Comprehensive Dental Treatments

We offer dental services like implants, painless root canals, smile design, whitening, oral and gum surgeries, cosmetic dentistry, Invisalign, and top-notch treatments, all at affordable rates.
